comments.body:
Add the tags "local", "regression-test" by default, and you'll have to modify jenkins testing to run:

bazel test $(bazel query "//tensorflow/... except attr(tags, 'local', //tensorflow/...)")

instead of what's currently there:

bazel test //tensorflow/...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@# -*- Python -*-

load("//tensorflow:tensorflow.bzl", "tf_py_test")

# Create a benchmark test target of a TensorFlow C++ test (tf_cc_*_test)
